game.title: my quest
game.reward: gold coins, and a powerful artifact

task.description: The old traveler from the Crossroads says he has a journal fragment that you must obtain for him.
When you read the journal fragment, you discover it shows you the way to where the old traveler hides his treasure.
After following the journal's instructions, you find the traveler's hideout. Search the riverbed for an old ring.
When you put the old ring on your finger, you feel strangely energized and alive.
